snippet: Two apps, iHeart Radio, from Clear Channel Communications, and TuneIn, help broadcasters reach new listeners. There are concerns, though, about the cost of online royalties and the two companies’ plans.
abstract: Apps iHeart Radio, from Clear Channel Communications, and TuneIn, are aggregators, conduits for thousands of online radio streams; aggregators, which both have amassed big audiences, can help broadcasters reach new listeners but there are concerns about the cost of online royalties and the two companies’ plans.
lead_paragraph: Two apps, iHeart Radio, from Clear Channel Communications, and TuneIn, help broadcasters reach new listeners. There are concerns, though, about the cost of online royalties and the two companies’ plans.

headline.seo: Two Apps, TuneIn and iHeart Radio, Put Radio Online
headline.main: Aggregators Help Radio Reach Online Audiences
headline.print_headline: Aggregators Help Radio Reach Online Audiences
